title: Sport im Bild
additional-notes: The exact date of the first active renewal is uncertain.  The renewal for 'Station am Horizont' by Erich Maria Remarque says that it was published in 7 installments in Sport im Bild with copyrights between November 25, 1927 and February 17, 1928, but does not specify exact issue dates.

This is a German publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.
